controller

Class WeaponController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
      • controller.WeaponController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WeaponObserver

    public class WeaponController
extends Controller
implements WeaponObserver
    MVC Controller for the weapon-related actions

      Checks if the selected square is valid and in that case proceeds to save it for later use in the selected weapon class
      void update(OptionalFireModesEvent event)
      Checks if the received index corresponds to a valid fire mode and in that case proceeds to use the chosen fire mode
      void update(PickUpPaymentEvent event)
      Checks if the selected powerup actually result in a valid payment, if so the cost of the weapon PickUp cost gets paid, otherwise the player gets asked for new inputs
      void update(ReloadPaymentEvent event)
      Checks if the selected powerUps actually result in a valid payment, if so the cost of the weapon Reload gets paid, otherwise the player gets asked for new inputs
      void update(TargetsSelectionEvent event)
      Checks if the received inputs correspond to valid targets and in that case proceeds to ask the next requirement for the current weapon
      void update(WeaponPaymentEvent event)
      Checks if the selected powerUps actually result in a valid payment, if so the cost of the weapon fire mode gets paid, otherwise the player gets asked for new inputs
      void update(WeaponReloadEvent weaponReloadEvent)
      Checks if the received input corresponds to a reloadable weapon and in that case proceeds to reload it
      void update(WeaponSelectionEvent event)
      Checks if the received input corresponds to a valid weapon, and in that case, shows the available fire modes for that weapon
      void update(WeaponSwapEvent event)
      Checks if the received input actually corresponds to a weapon the player can swap, if so the weapon gets swapped, otherwise the player is asked for a new input

        Parameters:
